医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
COVID-19 大流行期间新加坡家庭适应的新见解新加坡国立大学杨潞龄医学院 (NUS Medicine) 进行的一项新研究分析了新加坡家庭在 COVID-19 大流行期间的恢复能力，发现了重要的发现，突显了大多数有幼儿的家庭如何成功地适应了新冠肺炎疫情带来的挑战。全球危机。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/New-insights-into-family-adaptation-in-Singapore-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/New-insights-into-family-adaptation-in-Singapore-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b3b7711-1717-4701-b58c-88f5a56c4c2d Tue, 08 Oct 2024 07:05:15 -0400 New insights into family adaptation in Singapore during the COVID-19 pandemic
利用 SmartCADD 彻底改变药物发现药物发现很像拼图游戏。药物分子背后的化学成分必须被设计成与我们体内的蛋白质相匹配才能产生治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Revolutionizing-drug-discovery-with-SmartCADD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Revolutionizing-drug-discovery-with-SmartCADD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0350bc4a-649d-4ea8-86a0-86e9db02598a Tue, 08 Oct 2024 06:58:40 -0400 Revolutionizing drug discovery with SmartCADD
破译人类微生物组的奥秘Microsetta Initiative 研究人类微生物组，分析各种数据以揭示微生物、饮食和健康之间的联系，以改善公众健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Deciphering-the-Mysteries-of-the-Human-Microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Deciphering-the-Mysteries-of-the-Human-Microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b826adf6-45d8-4a85-b5cc-a3b7144f213e Tue, 08 Oct 2024 06:56:00 -0400 Deciphering the Mysteries of the Human Microbiome
即将到来的 ACA 开放注册期有哪些新内容以及需要注意的事项又到了一年中的这个时候：在大多数州，《平价医疗法案》的健康计划年度公开报名季从 11 月 1 日开始，一直持续到 1 月 15 日。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Whate28099s-new-and-what-to-watch-for-in-the-upcoming-ACA-open-enrollment-period.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Whate28099s-new-and-what-to-watch-for-in-the-upcoming-ACA-open-enrollment-period.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66ad62c9-6386-4858-9af2-8b7b8ea651a1 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 06:52:10 -0400 What’s new and what to watch for in the upcoming ACA open enrollment period
一名男孩骑自行车死亡的事件困扰着黑人社区。 35年后，仍然没有人行道。约翰·帕克 (John Parker) 上学前在达勒姆东部的奇克路 (Cheek Road) 上骑的自行车与一辆皮卡车相撞，导致约翰·帕克 (John Parker) 死亡，至今已有 35 年了。他当时 6 岁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/A-boye28099s-bicycling-death-haunts-a-Black-neighborhood-35-years-later-Theree28099s-still-no-sidewalk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/A-boye28099s-bicycling-death-haunts-a-Black-neighborhood-35-years-later-Theree28099s-still-no-sidewalk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4b19804-9621-45b2-9c25-f355f64c9cdf Tue, 08 Oct 2024 06:49:00 -0400 A boy’s bicycling death haunts a Black neighborhood. 35 years later, There’s still no sidewalk.
CrestOptics 和徕卡显微系统公司宣布战略合作，以扩展转盘显微镜的功能CrestOptics 和 Leica Microsystems 之间的合作将 CICERO 转盘技术与 THUNDER 平台相结合，提供卓越的显微镜解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/CrestOptics-and-Leica-Microsystems-announce-strategic-collaboration-to-expand-capability-of-spinning-disk-microscopy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/CrestOptics-and-Leica-Microsystems-announce-strategic-collaboration-to-expand-capability-of-spinning-disk-microscopy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42b26c6d-cb25-4d41-a57b-1eefb3819dd1 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 06:40:00 -0400 CrestOptics and Leica Microsystems announce strategic collaboration to expand capabilities of spinning disk microscopy
Mosaic Therapeutics 任命 Barry Davies 博士为 CSO Barry Davies 博士作为 CSO 加入 Mosaic Therapeutics，带来了 25 年的药物发现专业知识，以推进靶向肿瘤治疗和精准医学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Mosaic-Therapeutics-appoints-Dr-Barry-Davies-as-CSO.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Mosaic-Therapeutics-appoints-Dr-Barry-Davies-as-CSO.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18b13e9f-2a1b-4460-aeb9-41979b0cbad3 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 06:37:00 -0400 Mosaic Therapeutics appoints Dr Barry Davies as CSO
研究揭示接受膝盖手术的儿童患骨软骨炎的风险生长痛在成熟的儿童中很常见，但有时这种生长可能会不规则并导致伤害。盘状外侧半月板 (DLM) 是一种畸形的膝关节软骨，可能会退化为剥脱性骨软骨炎，这是一种关节疾病，骨骼和关节开始与其余骨骼分离。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Study-reveals-osteochondritis-risk-in-children-undergoing-knee-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Study-reveals-osteochondritis-risk-in-children-undergoing-knee-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b9d8349c-c2f3-4ead-aa1c-07e3fab63289 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 02:27:28 -0400 Study reveals osteochondritis risk in children undergoing knee surgery
脑干炎症可以解释长期的新冠症状一项研究表明，严重的 Covid-19 感染对身体和精神造成长期影响的原因是脑干（大脑的“控制中心”）受损。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Brainstem-inflammation-may-explain-long-Covid-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Brainstem-inflammation-may-explain-long-Covid-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6345a113-eb97-45ca-bfa9-cd0d3359bd2d Tue, 08 Oct 2024 02:22:12 -0400 Brainstem inflammation may explain long Covid symptoms
研究表明，常见的乳腺癌疗法可能会加速衰老加州大学洛杉矶分校健康琼森综合癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，常见的乳腺癌治疗方法，包括化疗、放疗和手术，可能会加速乳腺癌幸存者的生物衰老过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Common-breast-cancer-therapies-may-speed-up-aging-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Common-breast-cancer-therapies-may-speed-up-aging-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=012d6185-610f-4827-89bb-7381d5e18a26 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 01:06:24 -0400 Common breast cancer therapies may speed up aging, study shows
